main.name: Miguel Guerra-Mondragon
main.bio: I have been using computers to play video games since I can remember, and I've always loved the idea of being able to build something, and that's what software allows me to do. Combine my imagination with my tools to create.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build projects for your business.!

quotes1.title: I Would Love to make your Ideas real
quotes1.description: I love graphic design and photography and have been working on my portfolio since 2016. You can download my resume in order to learn the details of my professional life as a designer and photographer. Contact me and we will discuss your projects!

quotes2.title: I can give your business a new creative start right away! Hire me for your Awesome project

education.description: OOP, UI/UX Design, Web Development, Data Analysis, Human-Computer Interaction and More

certificate.description: Game Development, Game Engine Development, 3D Modeling, Level Creation and More

work.title: Web Designer
work.description: UI/UX designing, competitor research, domain management, SEO, and developing sites.

work2.title: Event Cooordinator/Staff
work2.description: Gaming lounge where I run tournaments for TFT, League of Legends, Valorant, CSGO and more. Been helping out here for 2 years

work3.title: Freelance Web Designer
work3.description: Latest project: Shopify Ecommerce site for trading cards that was redesigned and reorganized to increase sales and usability.

work4.title: Lead Pharmacy Technician
work4.description: Worked through four promotions at CVS which taught me time management, communication within a team, leadership and customer service skills

resume.skillssectiontitle: Motivated by the Desire to achieve Success

projects.title: Driver Tracking Android App
projects.description: Worked with a group of three other students to develop a proof of concept driver tracking app for Pizza Hut’s mobile app. Using Android Studios and Google’s API, we developed a working prototype between two phones using Firebase, that functioned similar to Uber Eats or Lyft. The app has driver time estimates, live driver tracking, push notification, and more.
projects.technologies: Java, XML, Firebase, Google API, Android Studios

projects.title: Psychology Web Game
projects.description: Worked with a group of three other students to develop an educational video game for ASU’s online school (K-12) psychology class. The game features a scavenger hunt for clues that teach students about the different types of psychology.
